snippet.title: GODZILLA 2000 - Gameplay Trailer │ STE: Melee
snippet.description:
Godzilla MILLENNIUM has joined the roster! The Big G has finally shown his face. Stay tuned for more STEM updates!

(Godzilla: Save the Earth - Melee is a fan-made mod project by Godzilla fans for Godzilla fans. Originally beginning in 2021 as a simple "overhaul" of the 2004 game Godzilla: Save the Earth by Pipeworks Studios, STE Melee evolved over the years into an unofficial fully-fledged sequel to the Pipeworks Godzilla games we've all been waiting for! As originally a PS2 game, STEM runs in an emulator, so it can only be played on PC/Linux/Steam Deck. STE Melee has not yet been released, as it's a huge, all-encompassing remaster that includes additional content. There's no estimated release date as this is a completely free project done out of passion. In the meantime, please enjoy these windows into our development!)

https://twitter.com/GodzillaSTE
discord.gg/2ZqbppAMkY
